subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lee Westwood took advantage of some shaky play from Rory McIlroy and Thomas Bjorn, shooting a five-under-par 67 for a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Dubai Desert Classic.
snippet: Lee Westwood took advantage of some shaky play from Rory McIlroy and Thomas Bjorn, shooting a five-under-par 67 for a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Dubai Desert Classic.
